mapper.select: SELECT EID,JOB_TITLE_CODE,ti.name titlename,JOB_LEVEL_CODE,DELIVERY_CAPABILITY_CODE,cap.name capName,JOB_POSITION_CODE,pos.name posname,CONFIRM_STATUS,con.name confirmName,REJECT_REASON,INS_USER_ID,INS_TIMESTAMP,UPD_USER_ID,UPD_TIMESTAMP FROM emp_job_info j INNER JOIN (SELECT CATEGORY_CODE,CODE,NAME FROM cd_master_m WHERE CATEGORY_CODE='1010') ti ON ti.code = j.JOB_TITLE_CODE INNER JOIN (SELECT CATEGORY_CODE,CODE,NAME FROM cd_master_m WHERE CATEGORY_CODE='1040') cap ON cap.code = j.DELIVERY_CAPABILITY_CODE INNER JOIN (SELECT CATEGORY_CODE,CODE,NAME FROM cd_master_m WHERE CATEGORY_CODE='0060') con ON con.code = j.CONFIRM_STATUS INNER JOIN (SELECT CATEGORY_CODE,CODE,NAME FROM cd_master_m WHERE CATEGORY_CODE='1050') pos ON pos.code = j.JOB_POSITION_CODE WHERE eid = #{eid}
